    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3391</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Let's go to the zoo</string>
            <string language="en">Let's go to the zoo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lassen Sie uns zum Zoo gehen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Partons au zoo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deixe-nos ir ao jardim zoológico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Andiamo al giardino zoologico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πηγαίνετε στο ζωολογικό κήπο</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Unitat de programació de llengua anglesa centrada en el Zoo. Es basa en la importància que tenen per a l'aprenentatge de les llengües estrangeres tant els aspectes motivacionals com l'assoliment d'un equilibri adequat entre les destreses -skills- exercitades mitjançant les diferents activitats.</string>
            <string language="en">A programme unit for English focussed on the zoo. It consists of a variety of activities designed to motivate pupils and achieve a balance between the different language skills exercised.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">animal</string>
            <string language="en">animal</string>
            <string language="es">animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió oral</string>
            <string language="en">listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió oral</string>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió del text</string>
            <string language="en">text comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión del texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vocabulari</string>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
            <string language="es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió escrita</string>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Programmmaßeinheit für Englisch 
konzentrierte auf den Zoo. Sie besteht aus einer 
Vielzahl der Aktivitäten, die konzipiert sind, um Pupillen zu 
motivieren und eine Balance zwischen den unterschiedlichen ausgeübten
Sprachenfähigkeiten zu erzielen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité de programme pour l'anglais concentré
sur le zoo. Il se compose d'une variété d'activités conçues 
pour motiver des pupilles et pour réaliser un équilibre entre les 
différentes capacités linguistiques exercées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade do programa para o inglês focalizou 
no jardim zoológico. Consiste em uma variedade das atividades 
projetadas motivate as pupilas e conseguir um contrapeso entre as 
habilidades de língua diferentes exercitadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'unità di programma per l'inglese messo a 
fuoco sul giardino zoologico. Consiste di una varietà di 
attività destinate per motivare le pupille e realizzare un equilibrio
fra le abilità di linguaggio differenti esercitate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια μονάδα προγράμματος για τα αγγλικά εστίασε στο 
ζωολογικό κήπο. Αποτελείται από ποικίλες δραστηριότητες με
σκοπό να παρακινήσουν τους μαθητές και να επιτύχουν μια ισορροπία
μεταξύ των διαφορετικών γλωσσικών δεξιοτήτων που ασκούνται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
